description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is That One Guy with some pushback on the language we used to describe Marc Andreessen’s hypocrisy and misrepresentation of reality: Stop giving terrible people the benefit of the doubt The word you’re looking for is lie, as in ‘When someone says something that they […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
